section.title: SSHD Use Privilege Separation
section.para: Configures the secure shell daemon to use multiple processes so that multiple processes are used to prevent potential privilege escalation vulnerabilities.

For all operating systems, the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file will be examined. If present, the value for the 'UsePrivilegeSeparation' setting will be examined. If the value is not 'yes', it will be corrected.

listitem.para: GEN005537 - The SSH daemon must use privilege separation.
